feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.103.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed feedback buttons' layout breaking in different languages, in newsletters (#21752) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🔥 Removed UI for AMP (#21762) - Hannah Wolfe

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.101.6...v5.103.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.104.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Fixed SVG sanitization for staff profile pictures (#21798) - fhAnso, Mohammed A., Hoang, Sag
  • ✨Added custom font support for themes (#21817) - Steve Larson
  • 🎨 Updated Casper to v5.8.1 - Ghost CI
  • 🎨 Updated Source to v1.4.1 - Ghost CI

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.103.0...v5.104.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.104.1
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.104.0...v5.104.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.104.2
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.104.1...v5.104.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.105.0
entry.content:
• 🔒 Limited permissions for uploaded files to 0644 (#21841) - Princi Vershwal
  • ✨ Improved various aspects of comments app - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed responsive issues with Posts filters (#21871) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed mobile navigation for Admin (#21863) - Daniël van der Winden
  • 🐛 Fixed missing subscription attribution on free to paid upgrade (#21846) - Sag
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan translations in comments.json (#21827) - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Added missing Turkish translations to portal.json (#21784) - echobilisim3421
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan translations in signup-form.json (#21831) - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.104.2...v5.105.0
